title: About
text: I’m 23, born and raised in New York City, and currently in medical school. I write to remind myself to slow down, notice things, and make sense of them. I care deeply about finding balance between work and life, ambition and rest. I like visiting museums, trying new foods, and dabbling in learning how to cook better and healthier. This space is a quiet place for reflection, curiosity, and whatever’s on my mind.

title: Welcome To My Blog
text: Hi! I’m Sophie, and this is the first post on my blog. I’m excited to share my thoughts, stories, and experiences with you. Whether you’re here for personal reflections, creative ideas, or just to follow along on my journey, I hope you find something that resonates with you. Creating this website was a bit of a rollercoaster, to say the least, but here it is. Stay tuned for more posts soon, and thanks for visiting this work-in-progress.
